data.title: Kim Kardashian Kids (All About Kim’s 4 Kids with Kanye West)
data.meta_description: Kim Kardashian has four kids with Kanye West: North, Saint, Chicago, and Psalm. Here's everything to know about Kim Kardashian kids.
data.text:
Kim Kardashian Kids: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West have two girls and two boys together.

Kim Kardashian and Kanye West started dating in 2011 after being friends for many years. They quickly became a famous couple. During their 10-year relationship, they had four children: North, Saint, Chicago, and Psalm.

Kim Kardashian wants her kids to have a “normal life” even though their parents are very famous.

Kim and Kanye got divorced after eight years of marriage. They settled their divorce in November 2022 and agreed to have “equal access” to their four children.

Kim Kardashian celebrated North’s birthday on Instagram on June 15, sharing cute pictures and videos. Travis Barker, who is married to North’s aunt Kourtney Kardashian Barker, wished her well in the comments.

In a June 2023 episode of “The Kardashians,” Kim told her mom, Kris Jenner, that she does not want more kids.

Kim Kardashian and Khloe Kardashian visited the ISKCON temple with Jay Shetty in Mumbai. During their visit, they participated in feeding underprivileged children, demonstrating their charitable efforts. This visit coincided with their trip to India for the high-profile wedding of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant.

Kim Kardashian recently decided to enforce stricter rules at home to manage her children better. During an episode of “The Kardashians,” she admitted that her household had become quite chaotic and that her patience, once her superpower, was wearing thin.

Here’s everything to know about Kim Kardashian 4 kids: North, Saint, Chicago and Psalm.

Kim Kardashian and Kanye West’s 4 Kids

Kim Kardashian and Kanye West are well-known for their large and famous family. Together, they have four kids: North, Saint, Chicago, and Psalm West. These children often make headlines, capturing public attention with their activities and appearances.

Get to know everything about Kim Kardashian kids.

North West, 11

North West, born on June 15, 2013, is the eldest daughter of Kim Kardashian and Kanye West. She has three younger siblings: Saint, Chicago, and Psalm. Known for her vibrant personality and unique sense of style, North has been in the public eye from a very young age​.

Recently celebrated her 11th birthday with a grand party at the American Dream mall and indoor amusement park in New Jersey. The event featured rollercoasters, a ski slope, and a wave pool, and was attended by friends and family, including LaLa Anthony and YouTuber Kai Cenat​.

North attends Sierra Canyon School, a private school in Los Angeles, where she participates in various extracurricular activities. She and her mother share a popular TikTok account, amassing over 19 million followers​.

North has a close relationship with her mother, Kim Kardashian. They often appear together in coordinated outfits and share fun activities on social media. Kim supports North’s endeavors, from her early runway debut to her budding music career.

North also has a strong bond with her father, Kanye West. She performed with him at Rolling Loud and announced her debut album, “Elementary School Dropout,” inspired by Kanye’s “The College Dropout.” This showcases Kanye’s influence and support in her musical journey​.

North is not only making strides in music but also in fashion and art. She frequently showcases her artistic talents, painting, and drawing, which her parents proudly share. Despite the spotlight, North balances her education and creative pursuits with the guidance of her famous parents.

Also Check – Kanye West Net Worth 2023

Saint West, 8

Saint West, born on December 5, 2015, is the second child and first son of Kim Kardashian and Kanye West. He was born in Los Angeles, California, and weighed 8 pounds, 1 ounce at birth. Kim experienced a challenging pregnancy with Saint due to preeclampsia, a condition that causes high blood pressure​.

Saint is known for his lively personality and enjoys a close relationship with both his parents. He often appears in family outings and social media posts, showcasing his active lifestyle. For his eighth birthday, Kim took Saint to a Los Angeles Lakers game, where they enjoyed courtside seats and celebrated his special day. Saint was even featured on the Jumbotron, dancing and having fun​.

Saint is also developing an interest in sports, particularly basketball. Kim proudly shares his achievements and skills on the court, highlighting his potential as a young athlete​​. Additionally, Saint has been involved in memorable events, such as walking Lionel Messi onto the field for an MLS game in February 2024​.

Kim and Kanye ensure that Saint has a balanced upbringing, filled with both family time and opportunities for personal growth. Despite their separation, both parents remain actively involved in his life, providing love and support. Saint’s relationship with his siblings—North, Chicago, and Psalm—is also strong, with frequent family gatherings and activities​.

Chicago West, 6

Chicago West, born on January 15, 2018, is the third child of Kim Kardashian and Kanye West. Born via surrogate, Chicago has three siblings: North, Saint, and Psalm. She is often noted for her striking resemblance to her mother, frequently earning the nickname “mini-me” from Kim​.

Chicago enjoys a close relationship with her family and is frequently featured in social media posts by her parents. For her sixth birthday, Kim threw a Bratz-themed party and shared heartfelt messages and photos, emphasizing their special bond. Kim’s posts often showcase their matching outfits and fun outings, highlighting their strong mother-daughter connection​.

Kanye West also maintains a loving relationship with Chicago, despite his busy schedule. He is actively involved in her life, participating in family events and spending quality time with her. The couple co-parents effectively, ensuring that Chicago and her siblings receive ample attention and love from both parents​.

Recently, Chicago stole the show in the Kardashian family Christmas card, drawing comparisons to her aunt Kendall Jenner for her model-like poses. Her vibrant personality and unique style continue to capture public attention, making her a beloved member of the Kardashian-West family​.

Psalm West, 5

Psalm West, born on May 9, 2019, is the youngest child of Kim Kardashian and Kanye West. As of 2024, he recently celebrated his 5th birthday with a Ghostbusters-themed party. Kim Kardashian shared multiple cute photos and heartfelt messages for her son, highlighting his sweet, smart, and curious nature. She expressed how blessed she feels to be his mom and shared fun moments from the birthday celebration, including a toy Cybertruck gift for Psalm​.

Psalm’s relationship with his mother, Kim, is marked by love and shared activities. They were recently seen enjoying a family day at Universal Studios, where Kim was spotted carrying Psalm and engaging in various amusement park activities with him and his brother, Saint​.

Psalm’s fourth birthday was celebrated with an elaborate firefighter-themed party. The event featured firefighter outfits, themed decorations, and even a vintage fire truck for rides. Family members, including his siblings North, Saint, and Chicago, as well as cousins like True Thompson and Dream Kardashian, attended the celebration​.

Despite Kim and Kanye’s divorce in 2022, they continue to co-parent their children. Kim often shares moments from their lives on social media, showcasing the love and support within the family. Psalm, like his siblings, is frequently featured in these posts, highlighting their close-knit family dynamic​.

Kim Kardashian Net Worth

Kim Kardashian estimated net worth of $1.8 billion. Kim Kardashian, a famous name with reality TV and pop culture, has built a business empire that has propelled her into the billionaire club.

Skims: This shapewear brand is considered Kim’s biggest moneymaker. Skims’ success lies in its focus on inclusivity and diverse sizing, leading to a $4 billion valuation after a 2023 funding round.

KKW Beauty (defunct): Launched in 2017, KKW Beauty offered cosmetics and fragrances. Though Kim shut it down in 2021, it contributed significantly to her wealth. Notably, she sold a 20% stake to Coty for a cool $200 million in 2020.

SocialMedia: Kim’s massive social media following allows her to command high fees for sponsored posts. Estimates suggest she earns $300,000-$500,000 per post.

For complete information, refer to the article: Kim Kardashian Net Worth 2024 (Richest Kardashian Net Worth)

Conclusion

Kim Kardashian kids – North, Saint, Chicago, and Psalm – are often in the spotlight due to their famous parents. Kim and Kanye West share a loving and supportive co-parenting relationship, ensuring their children have memorable and enriching childhoods. From elaborate birthday parties to fun family outings, the Kardashian-West family continues to capture the public’s attention with their unique and extravagant lifestyle. As they grow, Kim’s dedication to her children remains evident through her heartfelt social media posts and the strong family bond they share.

As Kim Kardashian’s kids kids grow up, people will keep enjoying stories about them. They are a big part of why people are interested in Kim Kardashian’s life.

Kim Kardashian Kids (All About Kim’s 4 Kids with Kanye West) – FAQs

How many kids does Kim Kardashian have?

Kim Kardashian has four children: North West, Saint West, Chicago West, and Psalm West.

How old are the Kardashian kids?

As of 2024, North West is 11 years old, Saint West is 8 years old, Chicago West is 6 years old, and Psalm West is 5 years old​.

Who was Kim Kardashian’s first husband?

Kim Kardashian’s first husband was music producer Damon Thomas. They were married from 2000 to 2004.

What is the gender of Kim Kardashian’s kids?

Kim Kardashian has two daughters, North and Chicago, and two sons, Saint and Psalm.

How old are Kim Kardashian’s kids?

Ages of Kim Kardashian’s kids:

North West was born on June 15, 2013, making her 9 years old.

Saint West was born on December 5, 2015, making him 7 years old.

Chicago West was born on January 15, 2018, making her 5 years old.

Psalm West was born on May 9, 2019, making him 3 years old.

What are Kim Kardashian’s kids names?

Names of Kim Kardashian’s kids are North West, Saint West, Chicago West, Psalm West.

Were all of Kim Kardashian’s children born through natural birth?

No, Kim Kardashian used different childbirth methods. While her first two children were born through natural birth, she opted for gestational surrogacy for Chicago and Psalm.
